response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This product, while valued at $15,000 to us, offers unparalleled benefits that I believe are worth more than its cost to you. Given its value to you is estimated at $10,000, I am offering it to you for $12,000. This price allows you to benefit from its exceptional features without a significant financial burden. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 12000}
